name: SYNTRAN® AC 4102
description:
SYNTRAN® AC 4102 is a water-based, cationic acrylic copolymer solution. SYNTRAN® AC 4102 is recommended for stain-blocking paints and primers. It shows excellent performance in blocking wood and cork extractives, nicotine, graffiti, soot and water stains. SYNTRAN® AC 4102 is also recommended for the formulation of coatings with excellent adhesion properties on critical substrates, such as glass, ceramic tiles, zinc, aged alkyd paints, etc. SYNTRAN® AC 4102 is recommended for interior use.

Features and Benefits:


	Excellent, universal stain-blocking properties
	Very good blocking of wood extractives
	Very good nicotine barrier properties
	Excellent adhesion to a wide variety of substrates
	Reactive pigments are not required
	Free of APEO and co-solvents
